title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 43.14 - Records and availability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 43.14 - Records and availability

State Regulations

Each milk dealer and cooperative shall maintain complete
and accurate records and accounts of all milk and milk products purchased, received or handled, billings and payments and such other records as may be
required for the administration and enforecment of section 258-b of the Law and
the terms and provisions of this Part. All such records and accounts shall be
made available to the commissioner or any employee designated by him for such
purpose. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
43.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
